reviews.title: Breathtaking, easy to use and set up
reviews.text:
I expected this to be good but not this amazing!! The app Wander has taken me to beautiful places I wish I could visit. You feel as if you are just flying.
 Watch the movie “We are stars” 360vr on YouTube and it will take your breath away! My grandson came over and played a drum game… he asked to have this for Christmas after he played it lol (he is 5) and
